HOME_CONSTANTS.HEADER_SUB_TEXT: We look to bring joy to the hardcore sports fan through Technology
HOME_CONSTANTS.JOURNEY_SUB_TEXT: Super Six Sports Gaming was conceptualized in 2019 by 6 sports enthusiast who set out to make India’s No. 1 Sports Engagement Company. The idea is to delight customers and make the experience of engaging with sport more exciting than ever before.
HOME_CONSTANTS.VISION_SUB_TEXT: To Bring joy to the hardcore sports fan through Technology. To Bring joy to the hardcore sports fan through Technology.
HOME_CONSTANTS.MISSION_SUBTEXT: Launch world class products in the domain of Sports on the back of Tech to drive sports engagement, create a sports ecosystem and build a legal, scalable & profitable business.
HOME_CONSTANTS.PRODUCT_HEADER_ONE: We are Very proud of the products that have we build so far...
HOME_CONSTANTS.PRODUCT_HEADER_SUBTEXT: Over the past 3 years, SSSG has provided world-class customer experience for sports fans in India.
HOME_CONSTANTS.PRODUCT_HEADER_TWO_SUBTEXT: We swear by our Core Values which serve as guiding principles in our vision to bring joy to sports fans.
HOME_CONSTANTS.FOUNDING_HEADER_SUBTEXT: Meet our visionary founders who bring their robust corporate experience, along with their love for sport, to drive a healthy culture and work environment.
HOME_CONSTANTS.JOIN_TEAM_SUBTEXT: We firmly believe that an organisation is as good as the people who work for it. We love to pamper our employees as they deliver high quality work in our journey of creating India’s best sports ecosystem.

CAREER_CONSTANTS.CAREER_HEADER: Together, we can create success story
CAREER_CONSTANTS.CAREER_HEADER_SUBTEXT: We are a young organization, full of people who are passionate about bringing technology in the domain of sports and take pride in being a customer centric organization which believes in 100% transparency with our internal as well as external stakeholders.
CAREER_CONSTANTS.CAREER_TEAM_HEADER_TEXT: Our Team means everything to us, and providing a GREAT Workplace is our top priority!
CAREER_CONSTANTS.VISION_HEADER_SUBTEXT: To bring JOY to hard-core sports fans through technology
CAREER_CONSTANTS.GLIMPUSES_SUBTEXT: Meet our visionary founders who bring their robust corporate experience, along with their love for sport, to drive a healthy culture and work environment.

TESTIMONIAL.name: Paramjeet Kumar
TESTIMONIAL.description: As an analytics professional, I always believe that numbers have some interesting stories to tell! Sports Analytics is just the right place where you start seeing the hidden patterns coming into action very fast! My experience here has been full of motivation and enthusiasm because of the excellent work culture and the opportunity provided at all levels.

TESTIMONIAL.name: Muskaan Sharma
TESTIMONIAL.description: As a creative person, I always like to be in a space where I get the freedom to experiment and do different things. Fantasy Akhada creates a workplace where people feel like they are a part of something bigger and their work is making a difference. The workplace is a healthy mix of collaboration and competition.

TESTIMONIAL.name: Aman Thakur
TESTIMONIAL.description: Being a die-hard sports fan, especially cricket, for me it was a dream come true to work in a field that I am most passionate about. When I got the offer from Fantasy Akhada, to be one of their first employees, I decided to give my 200% to the company. Since day one, I have seen the organisation grow to newer heights almost daily.

TESTIMONIAL.name: Namrata Singh
TESTIMONIAL.description: If there’s one thing l love about my job, it is the freedom to express the many ideas that come to me.

TESTIMONIAL.name: Kalpiit Pradhan
TESTIMONIAL.description: I have worked with multiple organizations before but nothing compares to my experience at Fantasy Akhada. Every team I have met so far is full of motivation and enthusiasm. This place gives me the liberty to think out of the box and have fun while working. Fantasy Akhada can give you a career instead of a job.

CARDS.subtext: We take full responsibility for your career & financial growth Working in a fast-paced environment, we intend to expose our employees to various facets of their domain to make them rich with hands-on experience.

We do not glorify working overtime in the name of “startup hustle or hyper growth mindset”. Efficiency is best driven when there is a solid work life balance for our team members, and we swear by this principle..

Comprehensive Medical Insurance Cover has been an integral part of our compensation structure right from the very beginning. We believe in taking care of you and your loved ones when you need us the most.
Attractive compensation in line with the market along with our rich ESOP policy allows us to give our young and passionate team members a great shot at wealth creation.

We take full responsibility for your career & financial growth Working in a fast-paced environment, we intend to expose our employees to various facets of their domain to make them rich with hands-on experience.

sumit-jha.name: Sumit Jha
sumit-jha.description: The vision was to recreate a physical mall’s experience in the digital space that operates on a zero-commission model and provides a safe environment.
sumit-jha.professionalExperience: We know it’s hard to choose. The FOMO is real. Thankfully, you can have the best of both worlds – exchanges and wallets. It’s possible to easily move spending money out of an exchange into a spending wallet for your occasional bitcoin purchases. It’s also possible to store your bitcoin savings in a more secure software wallet while still getting access to the buying and selling features of bitcoin exchanges. Let us show you how.
